info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 6:20AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Elkhart, northern St. Joseph, northeastern La Porte, southwestern Cass and Berrien Counties through 645 AM EDT/545 AM CDT/... At 619 AM EDT/519 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Berrien Springs to near New Carlisle. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... South Bend, Elkhart, Mishawaka, Niles, Benton Harbor, St. Joseph, Buchanan, Georgetown, Gulivoire Park, Granger, Fair Plain, Simonton Lake, Osceola, Bridgman, New Buffalo, New Carlisle, Berrien Springs, Three Oaks, Edwardsburg and Stevensville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Indiana between mile markers 55 and 96. Interstate 94 in Michigan between mile markers 0 and 29. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
